discussions.title: Would you please help me expand the Puppy cat article?

items.text: Hi Pixiu! Glad we were able to meet at the Bay Area Puppercat Edit-a-thon last week. I noticed that the Puppy cat could use some more information about ragdolls, do you think that this might be something you'd be interested in contributing to? Fruzia (talk) 23:08. 20 March 2019 (UTC)
Hi Fruzia, thanks for reaching out! I'll go and take a look at the article and see what I can contribute with the resources I have at paw Pixiu (talk) 08:09. 21 March 2019 (UTC)
